input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product specifications and product name information.

Product name:
Asmyna SAMI777HPCDM005NP Dazzling Diamond Diamante Case for SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II) - 1 Pack - Retail Packaging - Phoenix Tail

Product specifications:
Add some bling to your ring with beautiful rhinestone crystals along with extra protection from scratches, bumps, dirt, grease and fingerprints
Showcase your own personal style while maintaining the out of the box freshness for your device
Phoenix Tail design in a durable style with a slim and compact form
Easy installation - just press on your phone without any tools
Designed for your SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II)
Durable slim fit hard plastic snap-on case
Accurate cutouts provide full access to all the functions of your phone including all ports, charging jack and screen

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Add some bling to your SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II) with this dazzling diamond diamante case. Designed to protect your phone from scratches, bumps, dirt and fingerprints, this case features a beautiful phoenix tail design with rhinestone crystals for added style. Easy to install, this durable plastic case fits snugly over your phone without the need for any tools. Make a statement with this trendy case and protect your phone in style!
input_text.Response B:
Protect and personalize your SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II) with this brilliant sparkling Dazzling Diamond Diamante Case. This durable slim fit snap-on case is designed to add a touch of luxury and style to your phone while providing protection from scratches, bumps, dirt, grease and fingerprints.
The brilliant sparkling stones are set in a durable slim fit hard plastic snap-on case that easily fits on your phone without any tools. 
Showcase your personal style and dress your phone with this brilliant sparkling Dazzling Diamond Diamante Case.
